metadata.title: CVE-2021-20320 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in s390 eBPF JIT in bpf_jit_insn inarch/s390/net/bpf_jit_comp.c in the Linux kernel. In this flaw, a localattacker with special user privilege can circumvent the verifier and maylead to a confidentiality problem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20320` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-216-generic - 4.4.0-216.249
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-216-generic - 4.4.0-216.249
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-216-lowlatency - 4.4.0-216.249
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
